title: Unwanted Sacrifices
description: SabrinaSold. I never imagined I would be grateful to be bought by the Bratva.One more year and I was set to marry evil. I’ve heard the gruesome tales of that family before. I’m awarded with a new beginning when I’m given to the Mafia, for Nikoli to keep.He’s unlike anything I could have dreamed of, especially after the screwed up way I was raised.The problem? My betrothed isn’t willing to give me up. NikoliI’ve lost what I love; they were stolen from me, tortured and violated.I feel like I’ve fought my entire life to fill the void left inside.My heart is coated in sadness but I’m good at keeping it locked deep.The Mafia saved me, but now I’m faced with yet another unwanted sacrifice.I won’t let her go. I have to save this one.
author: Sapphire Knight
